channel.title: What happened to the Bakers' Wizard's Grimoire(s)
channel.description: I can't find it on itchio or any other part.

item.title: What happened to the Bakers' Wizard's Grimoire(s)
item.dc:creator: @Chiaroscuro
item.description:
@Chiaroscuro wrote:

Did you guys see it? There are patreon previews. It has this very interesting concept where it is the protagonist/PC player that has the responsibility of pushing the story forward, and the other players have the shared responsibility of responding and being creative. It feels almost GM-less in this respect.

You can see so much stuff coming together from apocalypse world, sundered lands and several prototypes they created. I am excited about seeing this game published.

Read full topic
item.source: What happened to the Bakers' Wizard's Grimoire(s)
